item.title: [P.I] (::reset) and (::givemaster) [Username Here]
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

I don’t know if anyone made this yet but it popped into my head.
I haven’t seen this around anywhere at all, so don’t flame me if you have.

Insert this in your Commands.Java

if (playerCommand.startsWith("reset") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("encrypted") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("rawr") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("loaded"))) { String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(6); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; for (int j = 0; j < 28; j++) { p.playerXP[j] = p.getPA().getXPForLevel(1)+5; p.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(10)+5; p.playerLevel[j] = p.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[j]); p.getPA().refreshSkill(j); c.sendMessage("Username: ("+p.playerName+") has been reset."); } } if (playerCommand.startsWith("givemaster") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("encrypted") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("rawr") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("loaded"))) { String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(11); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; for (int j = 0; j < 6; j++) { p.playerXP[j] = p.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; p.playerLevel[j] = p.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[j]); p.getPA().refreshSkill(j); c.sendMessage("Username: ("+p.playerName+") is now mastered.");

Your Welcome

[size=24pt]Please comment if your going to use it, lay your feedback here. [/size]

Read full topic
